EmailTemplate.name: Event - Accelerate 2015.Email - Sponsorship Options
EmailTemplate.subject: Join us as a Sponsor! Accelerate 2015
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {{lead.First Name:default=edit me}},
We would like to invite you to join us as a Sponsor for Accelerate 2015, taking place on October 22nd, Tricentis’ annual international conference specializes in Enterprise Software Test Automation.
As a Sponsor you have the opportunity to present your skills to a wide audience that is dedicated to the field of software testing, pursue promising leads, and increase your sales. We are offering several Sponsorship packages <http://innovate.tricentis.com/rs/491-XCL-893/images/Accelerate 2015_ Sponsor Options.pdf> with options for exclusive access to advertising opportunities and much more.
If you are interested in becoming a Sponsor please click here <http://innovate.tricentis.com/rs/491-XCL-893/images/Accelerate 2015_ Sponsor Options.pdf> for package options. Please contact us with your sponsorship request by August 16th, 2015.
We look forward to partnering with you at Accelerate 2015!
Best Regards,
The Tricentis Accelerate Team
